title: 2 Bedroom apart in Algarve ( Portugal)
body:
QR Code Link to This Post


- 2 bedroom apartment with 80 m² of floor area, 45 m² terrace and 9 m² balcony
- 2 bathrooms
- 1 outdoor parking space
- window frames with double glazing
- equipped kitchen
- fitted wardrobes in bedrooms and entrance hall
- building built in 2013
- besides Tavira gran plaza ( shopping mall)
